Text: as always: nice upload @TVTeam. Thx for the excellent work
Incomplete...and for some reason it has 1 segment of the show repeating itself at the end. Bleh! Avoid...

No one is immune to temptation. Fame, money, titles... Even heroes succumb to these things, even though greatest heroes have no fame, no money, and no titles. He's a flawed human being, but still a good man by most standards. He has my respect for finally coming clean.
